name: workday-connector
description: Workday HCM integration with workers, positions, organizations, and payroll
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: Workday Connector
card.description: HCM integration with workers, payroll, and benefits

summary.overview: Workday HCM integration supporting worker management, position tracking, organization hierarchy, payroll integration, and benefits administration.
summary.exampleUseCase: Sync worker data from Workday, map positions to organization hierarchy, trigger payroll workflows based on position changes, and reconcile benefits elections.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct Workday API access for real-time HCM data. Pairs with HR Payroll Portal for local payroll processing. Organization hierarchy enables role-based access in EVE.
